benefits.description: Flexi sdddd Accountsdddds provide you with an important tax advantage that can help you pay health care expenses on a pre-tax basis. By anticipating your family’s health care costs for the next year, you can lower your taxable income.

benefits.title: Employee Assistance
benefits.description: The Employee Assistance is a professional talking and referral services designed to help you and your family members with personal, job or family related problems. Your EAP can help you and your dependents identify, resolve and gain control over personal problems that may be interfering with work and daily life. This plan is offered at NO cost to you!

benefits.title: Identity Protection

benefits.title: Paid Time Off (PTO)
benefits.description: VueSample provides employees with Paid Time Off (PTO) from work to use for vacation, personal time, personal illness or any other leave of absence. PTO will be administered per calendar year. PTO accrual will be based upon length of service.

benefits.title: 401k
benefits.description: We are EXTREMELY HAPPY to announce that VueSample will be executing Safe Harbor matching to your 401(k) contribution effective the week of January 22, 2019. Which means, VueSample will match your deferral 100% up to 3% of eligible compensation and 50% of the next 2%, further enhancing our truly REMARKABLE 401(k) plan.

benefits.title: 401(k) CCC
benefits.description: If you have questions about your workplace retirement plan, like how much to save for retirement or how to create a diversified investment portfolio, help is just a phone call or email away.  The advisors at NRS, the same team that advises your organization on its workplace retirement plan, can help answer your retirement savings questions.
